text: The 2007 Faroe Islands Premier League was the 65th annual competition since its establishment. In this championship, AB Argir and B71 Sandur were promoted from 1. deild. At the end of the 2006 season, ÍF Fuglafjørður and B68 Toftir were relegated. == Clubs == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Team ! City ! Stadium ! Capacity ! Manager |- | AB Argir || align="center" | Argir || align="center" | Inni í Vika || align="center" | 2,000 || |- | B36 Tórshavn || align="center" | Tórshavn || align="center" | Gundadalur || align="center" | 5,000 || |- | B71 Sandur || align="center" | Sandur || align="center" | Inni í Dal || align="center" | 2,000 || |- | EB/Streymur || align="center" | Streymnes || align="center" | Við Margáir || align="center" | 1,000 || |- | GÍ Gøta || align="center" | Norðragøta || align="center" | Sarpugerði || align="center" | 2,000 || |- | HB Tórshavn || align="center" | Tórshavn || align="center" | Gundadalur || align="center" | 5,000 || |- | KÍ Klaksvík || align="center" | Klaksvík || align="center" | Injector Arena || align="center" | 3,000 || |- | NSÍ Runavík || align="center" | Runavík || align="center" | Við Løkin || align="center" | 2,000 || |- | Skála ÍF || align="center" | Skáli || align="center" | Undir Mýruhjalla || align="center" | 2,000 || |- | VB/Sumba || align="center" | Vágur || align="center" | á Eiðinum || align="center" | 3,000 || |} ==League table== ==Results== The schedule consisted of a total of 27 games. Each team played three games against every opponent in no particular order. At least one of the games was at home and one was away. The additional home game for every match-up was randomly assigned prior to the season. ===Regular home games=== ===Additional home games=== == Top goalscorers == ; 18 goals * Amed Davy Sylla (B36) ;14 goals * Paul Clapson (KI) * Arnbjørn Hansen (EB/Streymur) ;13 goals * Christian Lundberg (KI) ;12 goals * Clayton Soares (B71) ;11 goals * Sorin Anghel (EB/Streymur) * Rógvi Jacobsen (HB) ;10 goals * Cardena Castilho Anderson (B36 / NSI) ;9 goals * Fróði Benjaminsen (B36) * Andrew av Fløtum (HB) ;8 goals * Christian Høgni Jacobsen (NSI/HB) * Hans Pauli Samuelsen (EB/Streymur) ==References== Category:Faroe Islands Premier League seasons 1 Faroe Faroe
title: 2007 Faroe Islands Premier League
